item.title: BBQ Seasoning
item.description: Ingredients 1 tablespoon Smoked paprika 2 teaspoon Brown Sugar 1 teaspoon Garlic Powder 1+1/2 teaspoon Salt 1/2 teaspoon Black Pepper Steps Combine ingredients

item.title: Fry Seasoning
item.description: Total: 5 minutes Ingredients 1 teaspoon (5ml) salt 1 teaspoon (5ml) paprika 1 teaspoon (5ml) onion powder 1 teaspoon (5ml) garlic powder 1 teaspoon (5ml) dried thyme 1/2 teaspoon (2.

item.title: Honey Dijon Dressing
item.description: Prep: 5 minutes Servings: 8 Ingredients ⅓ Cup Olive Oil 3 tablespoon Apple Cider Vinegar 1 tablespoon Dijon Mustard 3 tablespoon Honey ¼ teaspoon Salt 1 teaspoon Ground Black Pepper Steps Place all ingredients in jar Close lid shake until combined and then refrigerate
